ro.STAT_CONC_DEF:
Autorități publice locale se vor considera administrațiile publice sub-naționale care au responsabilitatea de a elabora strategii locale de reducere a riscurilor de dezastre.

Deoarece Cadrul de la Sendai promovează adoptarea și implementarea strategiilor locale de reducere a riscului de dezastre în fiecare autoritate locală, pentru indicatorul național se va considera APL de nivelul II (raion) și I (comuna)

SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 13.1.3: Proportion of local governments that adopt and implement local disaster risk reduction strategies in line with national disaster risk reduction strategies
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 13.1: Strengthen resilience and adaptive capacity to climate-related hazards and natural disasters in all countries
GOAL_META_LINK_TEXT: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 13.1.3: Proportion of local public authorities adopting and implementing local strategies to reduce the risks of exceptional situations in line with national strategies to reduce the risks of exceptional situations (same as 1.5.4/11.b.2)
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Local public authorities are considered to be the public sub-national administrations, which have the responsibility to develop the local strategy for disaster risk reduction.

As the Sendai Framework promotes the adoption and implementation of local DRR strategies in every local authority, the national indicator will consider the LPA of the II level (rayon) and I level (commune)
SOURCE_TYPE: Administrative data of LPA of level II and I
DATA_SOURCE:

2.Ministry of Environment/State Hydrometeorological Service

2. Ministry of Environment

3. Ministry of Agriculture and Food Industry
